item.description:
Our first meeting will focus on creating your language goals for the next 2 months. After that, we will pair English & Japanese speakers together to work on vocabulary, grammar, reading, & speaking skills. Please bring any books that you feel are helpful.

You can find free metered parking after 6pm on Main St. and Portland St, or by looking on the MIT website. East Lot is right next to the Stata Center, and Hayward Lot is not too far away.


Study Night website
Map to Stata Center

Wenbi
item.how_to_find_us: We will likely be in the cafe area. Look for the meetup sign on the tables. However, if you don't see us, walk around.
item.why: You'll have a chance to work towards your own language goals.
item.name: Japanese and English Study Night
